attributes.title: Scam
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in order to get the latest news about our president, but when I put my phone number in I began getting spammed with messages from robots trying to get me to click on scam links. It has been happening non stop since I put my phone number in and I think I am going to have to change my phone number. Itâ€™s unbelievable that the PRESIDENTâ€™S app would do this. I would give 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: Literally the worst app
attributes.review: This app is awful. It took 4 weeks to download. And while I waited I lost sleep staying up at night envisioning the fun I would have with this app and supporting our good ole â€˜Mercian president. My life was completely consumed, I lost my job, I stopped eating and even using the bathroom. I was so wrapped up with the idea of this app downloading on my phone that my wife divorced me, took our 3 children, and filed a restraining order. It also my made my PP smaller. :(

attributes.title: disastrous
attributes.review: If I could give it a zero, I would. It took over 2 days to finish downloading. Then, when I tried to open it, it would just glitch. I checked my internet and it is perfectly fine, so it must be the app. Plus, it was way too slow. I have seen apps developed by 5 year olds who run way better than this app. If doesnâ€™t even do anything other than glitch. I am extremely dissatisfied.
